opinion:
MOTION DOCKET, 71 Ohio St.3d 1474 (1995) 645 N.E.2d 1254-1260Supreme Court of Ohio. 1995.
MOTION DOCKET Thursday, February 23, 1995 94-2537. State v. Wilson. Lorain County, No. 92CA005396. On motion to supplement the record. Motion granted.
F.E. SWEENEY and PFEIFER, JJ., dissent.
COOK, J., not participating.
On motion to supplement record with a report used as evidence and on motion for stay of briefing. Motions denied.
WRIGHT and RESNICK, JJ., dissent.
COOK, J., not participating.Page 1475
